A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really wanted to like it\, but after having downed my huge soda and holding off on going to the bathroom because I didn’t want to miss anything important\, I realized\, “I’m not going to miss anything\, I don’t even like this movie.” So I left\, did what I needed to\, and came back to the slow space chase feeling much better\, but still disinterested in the movie.
